results.definition: a large sandwich made of a long crusty roll split lengthwise and filled with meats and cheese (and tomato and onion and lettuce and condiments); different names are used in different sections of the United States
Greek mathematician and inventor who devised a way to determine the area of a triangle and who described various mechanical devices (first century)
someone who fights for a cause
a man distinguished by exceptional courage and nobility and strength
examples: RAF pilots were the heroes of the Battle of Britain

results.definition: (classical mythology) a being of great strength and courage celebrated for bold exploits; often the offspring of a mortal and a god
(Greek mythology) priestess of Aphrodite who killed herself when her lover Leander drowned while trying to swim the Hellespont to see her
the principal character in a play or movie or novel or poem
